EmailTemplate.description: Customer notification email, when case is create from portal
EmailTemplate.name: CH_Portal Customer create message
EmailTemplate.subject: Nokia Care: Support Ticket created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for contacting Nokia Care via {!Case.Origin}. We appreciate your continued business and the opportunity to assist you with your enquiry.
Your {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created and is currently being directed to the appropriate Support Engineer. You will be contacted by the assigned Engineer.
Issue: {!Case.Subject}
If you would like to view or update your case online, please visit: https://cchtcs1-nokiapartners.cs90.force.com/customers/s/case/{!Case.Id}
Regards,
Nokia Care
